name: Binhex
description:
My first game created with Unrel Engine 4 (and my secund game ever).

This project was done to validate a semester during my 3rd year of Bachelor's Degree in computer science.

For this game we were forced to :

  • Make 3 differents levels
  • Use a First Person point of view
  • Create a Binary -> Decimal conversion mecanics
  • Create a Binary -> Hexadecimal conversion mecanics
  • Create a Decimal -> Binary conversion mecanics
  • Create a Decimal -> Hexadecimal conversion mecanics
  • Create a Hexadecimal -> Binary conversion mecanics
  • Create a Hexadecimal-> Decimal conversion mecanics
  • The player has to successfully convert the numbers in order to progress
  • The first level has to show the Binary -> Decimal conversions
  • The secund level has to show the Binary -> Decimal conversions and the the Decimal -> Binary conversions
  • The third level has to show all the conversions mecanics
  • The game has to be around 10 to 15 minutes long.
